channel.title: Frozen cant attack(delta source)
channel.description: hey guyz im having a problem. when i freeze a player he will get freeze and, when he trys to melee me it says you frozen and wont let him melee me even when im closer to him.:s but how ever range works when his fozen he can attack with range... so can any1 plz help?
